name: berserk
caption: Berserk

effect.short: Raises this Pokémon's Special Attack by one stage every time its HP drops below half.
effect.full: Whenever this Pokémon takes damage from a move that causes its HP to drop below 50%, its Special Attack rises by one stage.

flavorText:
Boosts the Pokémon’s Sp. Atk stat when it takes a 
hit that causes its HP to become half or less.
